item.title: Multichannel vibrotactile glove
item.description: The project Our lab is interested in how hearing interacts with the other senses. We are particularily interested in the sense of touch because of its ability to percieve vibrations. This relates to hearing, which is a sense specialized in percieving vibrations transmitted through the air in the form of pressure variations. This project aimed to develop a new haptic glove that transmits sounds in the form of vibrations to the skin of the hands.
